text: I need an API, which takes request as companyID and response to all related line-items
company has parent and child relatios, need to get all related deals line items
I'm looking for a way to get all meetings within a certain month.

Hi <@U01GRPSP8RF>,
Thanks for replying.
I have tried this but still i am getting all rows of this table.may be i am still doing something wrong. I am attaching my table screen shot . could you please tell me how can i select first row on the basis of portal id value(portal id is one of my column of that table) .
thanks!

<@U01NLJDQM8V>
``` {% set table = hubdb_table_rows(<tableId>,'portal_id__eq=8567564') %}```
I tried to duplicate the query please check by tableId and  portal_id will be column_name
make sure the second argument will be in string else it will give you all rows.

It worked!!Thank you so much <@U01GRPSP8RF> .

One more query ,it is giving me output with columns no.s how can i select a particular column from it.

Thanks!

<@U01GRPSP8RF> It is asking for your object type .I think you have to add the object name(ticket,deal,contact) in your api address
for ex:
`<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas/ticket?hapikey=YOUR_HubSpot_API_KEY>'`
as follows if you want to create ticket .

Hi,

I have a problem with some API and on support chat said me maybe here somebody can help me.

I got all the companies with getAllCompany and used this offset paramter, worked well, every iteration got back a different offset number until finished.

When I would like to do the same with getAllContacts, it is not working. I think because I get back every iteration the same offset parameter.

What should I do? Is it working well and I use this API wrong or what?

Here is the screenshot about two different api work.

THanks,
Thanks once again <@U01GRPSP8RF>. I will try this code and will let you know .
You're use the `paging.next.after` param from the response as the new cursor when making the next request?

in companies api i use offset, in contacts i use vid-offset like in example code here:

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/get_contacts>
what kind of paging parameter do you mean <@U01SBFHARMZ>?
If you're writing new code, you'd be better off to use the v3 API (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts>) instead of the v1.  I think that's the one <@U01SBFHARMZ> is referring to.

Thanks, now V3 companies and contacts working well for me. Marketing emails have only V1 today(V3 under development as I read). In this email API have offset parameter but it is always 0. How can I get all the marketing emails data then <@U01BBV0L2CF> ?
Sorry <@U01UMSF4YH3>, I haven't used that part of the API; hopefully someone else can answer.

Did somebody use this API?

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/cms_email/get-all-marketing-emails?_ga=2.30794748.2140085446.1618749949-1982138078.1617032588&_gac=1.124187384.1618759158.Cj0KCQjwse-DBhC7ARIsAI8YcWIBPGW0FnWI99cDWoNNDVJJvA6L4xvy3wKeMOq6sKKlOSzcRN1DozcaArIdEALw_wcB|https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/cms_email/get-all-marketing-emails?_ga=2.307[â€¦]I99cDWoNNDVJJvA6L4xvy3wKeMOq6sKKlOSzcRN1DozcaArIdEALw_wcB>

I got offset 0  in every iteration and then I can not get all the data.

Is anyone having issues getting a token when passing in the auth code? I'm getting 415 even though I am passing in `application/json`
Can anyone help?
Well for those who comes searching for an answer, it looks like Content-Type: application/json did not work and I had to use `Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded`
